executable.title: Evaluate Weight
executable.description: Given an input vector field and a polygonal surface, evaluate the vector field at the surface vertices using tri-linear interpolation. The vector field should be represented as a files series of type *.mha. The output is a VTK file where the vectors are stored as point data.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is supported by Air Force Research Laboratory (AFRL)

directory.name: WeightDirectory
directory.label: Weight Directory
directory.description: The directory to contain the weight files, which are expected to be in *.mha format and have the same image dimensions.

geometry.name: InputSurface
geometry.label: Surface vertices to evaluate at
geometry.description: The weight vectors will be evaluated at these surface vertices

geometry.name: OutputSurface
geometry.label: Surface output file
geometry.description: Output surface in VTK format. The weight vectors are stored as point data.

boolean.name: InvertY
boolean.label: Invert Y Coordinates
boolean.description: Whether to invert the y coordinate of the input surface
